description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for senior advisors.
full_summary:
================================
### RFP: Senior ATIP Advisor(s) – Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist

**Tender Information:**
-----------------------------------

### Solicitation Number:
W847C-6000603005

### Publication Date:
2023-06-05

### Tender Closing Date:
2023-06-20, 14:00:00 EST

### Expected Contract Start Date:
2023-07-04

### Expected Contract End Date:
2025-07-03

### Procurement Type:
Request for Proposals (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

### Procurement Category:
Service (SRV)

### Trade Agreements:
This RFP is open to bidders from countries with which Canada has a free trade agreement, including:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Bid Submission: 
-----------------------------------

* Bidder submissions are to be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys portal
* Bidders must ensure they have read and understood all terms and conditions prior to submission
* Proposals are to be received by 14:00:00 EST on 2023-06-20

### Evaluation Criteria: 
---------------------------------

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* Technical merit will account for 60% of the total evaluation, with price accounting for 40%

### Contracting Entity:
----------------------------------------------

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2
* Contact: Meghan Smith, meghan.smith@forces.gc.ca, (343) 573-4292

### Supporting Documentation: 
---------------------------------

* The RFP document is available for download from the Canada Buys portal: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6104/npp---senior-atip-advisors.pdf](https://canadab
